introduction.summary: I am a developer and SDLC-specialist eager to bring my 10+ experience to an organization that values my eye for efficiency and drive for constant improvement. I have a reputation for delivering on complex projects and am strongly committed to paying down technical debt. I seek to learn and teach as I continue my track-record of enabling development teams to deliver high-quality software fast.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Dev-ops focused developer since 2016. Before that I supported an in-house proprietary-lang desktop/web application.
highlights: Used MEDITECH proprietary languages to add an efficiency-testing application, mail-server API, and search-feature while maintaining web and desktop display libraries.
Rolled out and maintained Jenkins CI solution on GCP.
Authored dozens of features and bug-fixes for Jira-SVN integration.
Oversaw migration from Python 2 to 3 and refactored and improved coverage for server Python projects.
Provided developer-education through presentations, classes, 1-on-1s, documentation.
Served as scrum master and created roadmaps for software delivery-related epics.
